SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Actions
The Actions class manages the simulation actions, including starting, pausing, resuming, and stopping the simulation.
Chick
Represents a chick in the simulation.
Chickens
Represents chickens in the simulation.
Coordinates
The Coordinates class represents a point in a 2D space with x and y coordinates.
Creature
Abstract class representing a creature in the simulation.
Entity
Abstract class representing an entity in the simulation.
EntityFactory
Factory class for creating entities and populating the world map.
EntityType
Enumeration representing different types of entities in the simulation.
ExtraGrassFactory
Factory class for adding extra grass to the world map when needed.
FemaleFox
Represents a female fox in the simulation.
FoxCub
Represents a fox cub in the simulation.
Foxes
Represents a fox in the simulation.
Grass
Represents a grass entity on the map.
Hen
Represents a hen in the simulation.
Herbivore
Represents a herbivore in the simulation.
Kids
Interface for managing parent-related behaviors for entities.
Main
Main class for the 2D World Simulation application.
MaleFox
Represents a male fox in the simulation.
PathFinder
The PathFinder class provides methods for finding paths on the WorldMap using the A* algorithm.
Predator
Represents a predator in the simulation.
Rock
Represents a rock entity in the world map.
Rooster
Represents a rooster in the simulation.
Simulation
The Simulation class manages the entire lifecycle of the simulation, including initializing the map, starting, pausing, and stopping the simulation, and updating the UI.
SimulationUI
The SimulationUI class manages the user interface for the simulation.
Tree
Represents a tree entity in the world map.
WorldMap
The WorldMap class represents the map where entities are placed and interact.
WorldMapFactory
Factory class to create and populate a WorldMap with entities.
WorldMapPanel
WorldMapPanel is a custom JPanel for displaying a 2D simulation world map with entities.
WorldMapUtils
Utility class for operations related to the WorldMap.
